    , categories={BlockCategory.SEARCH}, input_schema=FactCheckerBlock.
    Input, output_schema=FactCheckerBlock.Output)

#14
encoded_statement = quote(input_data.statement)
url = f'https://g.jina.ai/{encoded_statement}'
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Authorization':
    f'Bearer {credentials.api_key.get_secret_value()}'}
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
response.raise_for_status()
data = response.json()
if 'data' in data:
